column1: # Title: Deetman et al. (2021) substation and transformers units per km
# Description: Deetman et al. provide estimates of transformer and substation units per km of high, medium, or low transmission and distribution lines
# Source: Deetman et al. 2021 Resources, Conservation and Recycling https://doi.org/10.1016/j.resconrec.2020.105200
